title: Multicultural Online Field Experience-Based Mentoring Action Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT proficiency and understanding of introductory educational science
context.additional_context: Mentoring-based action research curriculum conducted in smartphone-based mobile learning environments; focuses on understanding sociotechnical gaps in global educational settings and strengthening multicultural collaboration competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ICT integration cases in developing countries' educational settings to explain digital divide factors
Propose at least three technology utilization strategies suitable for multicultural educational environments through mentoring
Systematically design field problem-solving approaches by applying the action research process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
